activities: Twistbox receives personal data from the EU in support of the following:  1) from EU wireless carriers and operators in order to provide specific services that are requested by individual cell phone users; 2) directly from individuals who request the services in order to verify the identity of users.  This personal informaction received is usually limited to the user's cell number and name but some services may necessitate the user's address, age and identification.  The user must voluntarily opt-in on its cell phone to receive the service prior to having any personal information collected.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)
